name: washingTemperatureMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the water temperature mode of a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the water temperature mode.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment for adjusting the water temperature mode.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to which the water temperature should be set.
